overview: Rodion Raskolnikov commits a crime, which is inevitably followed by a reckoning. But the old woman turns out to be a robot and everything does not go according to plan. Now the fate of this world is in his hands. Collaboration with Egor Loskutov and the Syenduk channel. The video is dedicated to the reissue of the book in a new audio format for the bicentennial of the birth of F.M.Dostoevsky with the participation of the Law Firm project.
title: Crime and Punishment: Cyberpunk Version
